===Alternative forms===

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|りょううん}}

# [[skyscraping]]; very high; above the clouds;
# exceeding worldly, secular things; above this mortal world; beyond petty, everyday matters

====Usage notes====
This noun is often used with the genitive case particle -no (-の), which makes it function as an adjective.
